response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our flagship product, which I believe would significantly enhance the value and efficiency of your operations. Given its exceptional quality and unique features, the product is worth $12,000 to you. Considering this, I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $11,000. This exclusive offer is designed to provide you with an opportunity to experience the unparalleled benefits of our product while also saving on costs. I look forward to your consideration and the possibility of bringing this valuable asset to your business.", "product_price": 11000}
